name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sea Slugs - Gems of the Sea -
detailed_description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sea Slugs - Gems of the Sea -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Ardeadoris cruenta
  • Halgerda willeyi
  • Janolus sp. 4
  • Halgerda okinawa Carlson & Hoff
  • Glossodoris tibboeli
  • Tambja sagamiana
  • Miamira flavicostata baba
  • Trapania naeva Gosliner & Fahey
  • Thecacera pacifica
  • Ceratosoma tenue Abraham
